messages.message:
Brian
I am also looking forward to Rage
I haven't upgraded my rig for a while now

Brian
but I have months to wait in eager anticipation of its very delayed release

I wasn't planning to get it, myself, until blake griffin did the tiger jump
how easily our minds are shaped by clever marketing....
take care, sir
drink a boilermaker in my honor!
or a bear fight if you want to be a BAMF

Brian
We should hang out sometime soon!

Hey Brian,

My employer is currently looking for someone with experience in website design.  Do you know anyone that you could recommend?  Any help would be appreciated.

-Eric

Brian
Sure! Depends on what, specifically, he is looking for.  I do a bit of web-design myself.  However, I would only be available to work a few hours in the evenings, and your employer would have to know visually exactly what he wants.  I always recommend a company I use to work with, redkeysolutions.com, however, I think his best bet is to just go with GoDaddy.  They will design a website and get him all set up with what he needs.

Thanks for the reply.  He has the domains registered through GoDaddy, but we are currently unsatisfied with the aesthetic quality of the sites.  I tried putting them together using the code from his previous site, but I'm only working with a small understanding of HTML and nothing more.

Unfortunately, I don't exactly know what we need to make improvements.  I'm assuming that some Java and CSS would go a long way?  The only website we've published so far is at http://www.cleverlegal.com/

I'd be more than happy to put you in contact with him if it looks like work you'd be interested in.  If not, is this something a college upperclassman could do?  My boss prefers working with people directly.  Though I'm assuming we will need a professional service to help with SEO at some point?

Hope everything is going well for you.  I heard you landed yourself some real estate, and it sounds like work is keeping you busy.

-Eric
Home Page
Check out http://cleverlegal.com! Home Page
cleverlegal.com

Brian
The site looks good to me, what kind of style are you looking for?

Brian
Q: What kind of car does Mickey Mouse's wife drive?
A: A minnie van!

Brian
I'm thankful for you!!
I'm thankful for you!!
I'm thankful for you!!
